subject: Re: 2 new "Excerpts" for our accommodation not displaying
preview: Hi Martina,You actually don't need to do extra. It should show automatically now going forward.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Hi Martina,

You actually don't need to do extra. It should show automatically now going forward.

Thank you very much Rica for attending to those 2 "Excerpts" so quickly.

I have since added a new "Excerpt" to another one of our accommodations, https://royalrehab.com.au/accommodation/supported-accommodation-in-ryde/, and it too isn't displaying.

Could you please advise whether I need to do something else to make them display? I will be adding another 2 "Excerpts today" so don't want to keep interrupting you.

Thank you very much Rica.

Kind regards

MARTINA FOX​

COMMUNITY RELATIONS MANAGER

235 Morrison Rd

Ryde

NSW

2112

D.

+61 2 9808 9377

E.

Martina.Fox@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Martina,

Confirming that we have made the update in the listing so you can now go ahead and add the other excerpt. Please let us know if you would like further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Good morning


Would you please advise how I can display the 2 "Excerpts" I have filled in for https://royalrehab.com.au/accommodation/supported-accommodation-in-ryde-2/ and https://royalrehab.com.au/accommodation/supported-accommodation-in-concord/


I followed your instructions on https://www.loom.com/share/9b4ef8e68823424bbd73b67bed083db8 by writing the text in the "Excerpt" field but it is not displaying on https://royalrehab.com.au/disability-supports-and-accommodation/accommodation/specialist-disability-accommodation/.

I've cleared my Chrome cache and also checked on another computer but neither of the following excerpts are displaying:





I am about to add text to the "Excerpts" of our remaining properties.


Thank you in advance for your advice.


Kind regards



MARTINA FOX​
COMMUNITY RELATIONS MANAGER
235 Morrison Rd
Ryde
NSW
2112
D.
+61 2 9808 9377
E.
 Martina.Fox@Royalrehab.com.au








From: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>
Sent: Friday, 28 August 2020 10:30 AM
To: Martina Fox <Martina.Fox@Royalrehab.com.au>
Cc: Angela Shaw <angela.shaw@royalrehab.com.au>
Subject: Accommodation excerpts


Hi Martina,


On the website now we have the ability to add excerpts about the accommodation listings. See Bass Hill example below.


Previously the copy under the photos would automatically populate from the first 100 words of the description which wasn't ideal. Now you can tailor the experts for maximum appeal.


Here's the how too: https://www.loom.com/share/9b4ef8e68823424bbd73b67bed083db8




Kind regards,


Trudy.
TRUDY MCENEARNEY​
